thread.title: The only legal measurement of firewood is a "cord" and
thread.title_full: The only legal measurement of firewood is a "cord" and

title: The only legal measurement of firewood is a "cord" and
text:
The only legal measurement of firewood is a "cord" and ad date: 10/07/2015 
The only legal measurement of firewood is a "cord" and parts of a cord or cubic meter. A cord is the firewood contained in 128 cubic feet of space when tightly stacked A cord of firewood is a pile measuring 4-ft. wide, 4-ft. high and 8-ft. long. Whatever the dimensions of the pile, it must be equivalent to 128 cubic feet of tightly stacked firewood to be one cord. More info at: oregon.gov//ODA/MSD/Fuel_facts.shtml
